artist: Artist: Studio of Hans von Aachen
creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: group of figures in a darkly wooded scene presenting gifts on platters to R figure; two cherubs in front of and behind R figure, who is dressed in light drapery around legs, and is bare-chested, with gold and gauzy white adornment; kneeling figure on L, presenting a platter of fruit; C figure presents a platter of three doves; figure in ULQ presents a second platter of food; ornate gilded frame, with scroll work in all four corners, and dark pigmented recesses
title: Allegory of Abundance: The Frigid Venus
